author: senh
title: 36 Hours: 36 Hours in Eastern Tokyo
text: BING NEWS: The New York Times From The New York Times: From boutiques blooming in abandoned spaces to new ramen shops taking root amid high-rises, Eastern Tokyo promises to leave visitors wide-eyed with wonder.. Watch the original video on Times Video: http://nyti.ms/1VSssDj Al Jazeera ... 10/14/2015 - 7:59 am | View Link 36 Hours in Eastern Tokyo One of the most daunting cities for foreign visitors, Tokyo is a manic, hyperactive assault on the senses. But steady your focus and you’ll notice that a distinct strand of traditional elements also weaves through the Japanese capital.
